1232020.name: Unexplored Soundtrack
1232020.description:
For Unexplored 1, award winning composer Matthijs Dierckx produced a blend of orchestral and synth oriented music that propels the player forward through the dungeons. Now, relive your adventures with this remastered Original Soundtrack!

How to play?

Within Steam:
LIBRARY>MUSIC>UNEXPLORED OST

Out of Steam:
Copy or import the mp3-files to your favourite player. You'll find the folder containing the OST within the game folder, but you can also easily find it by starting Steam and then choose LIBRARY>MUSIC>UNEXPLORED OST>VIEW IN SYSTEM.
